messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to April Course 25. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's bots/animals has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: A rogue centcom official has escaped prison and found his way to your starsystem, please make sure he is not on your station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.
